1.name: Comprehension Questions on 'That is Nature' by Ahmad Shawqi

qa.question: ماذا يصف الشاعر؟
qa.describe: The poet describes the beauty of nature as a testament to God's creation.

qa.question: ما سبب اهتزاز الأرض والسماء؟
qa.describe: The earth and sky tremble because of the magnificent signs and relics of God's creation.

qa.question: بمَ يُشبّه الشاعر جمال الطبيعة؟
qa.describe: The poet compares the beauty of nature to the Quran, as both reveal the majesty of God.

qa.question: علامَ يدلّ الظواهر الطبيعية؟
qa.describe: The natural phenomena indicate the existence and majesty of God.

qa.question: ماذا يقول الشاعر لمن له شك وإنكار؟
qa.describe: The poet suggests that those who doubt should look at God's creation, as it will remove their doubts.

qa.question: كيف يصف الشاعر الخمائل؟
qa.describe: The poet describes the groves as containing elements that are like women adorned with anklets and bracelets, symbolizing their beauty.

qa.question: بمَ يُشبّه الشاعر الغدير والنبات؟
qa.describe: The poet compares the stream and the plants to a mirror adorned with a frame, likely due to the reflection of the surroundings in the water.

qa.question: ما المراد بـ'ضحوك سن'؟
qa.describe: 'ضحوك سن' likely refers to the bright, smiling flowers that fill the world with their beauty and light.

qa.question: كيف يبدو الغدير؟
qa.describe: The stream appears like a mirror adorned with a frame because of the reflection of the surrounding plants.

qa.question: مَنْ يُخاطِبُ الشَّاعِرُ في السَّطْرِ الأَوَّلِ؟
qa.describe: The poet is addressing a traveler or guide, asking him to stop so he can show him the beauty of nature.

qa.question: مَاذَا يَقُولُ الشَّاعِرُ عَنِ الدَّلِيلِ الَّذِي تُقَدِّمُهُ الطَّبِيعَةُ؟
options: إنه أكثر إقناعاً من أدلة العلماء
qa.describe: The poet says that nature's evidence of God's existence is so clear that it leaves no need for the evidence provided by jurists and scholars.

qa.question: مَا هِيَ الرِّسَالَةُ العَامَّةُ لِلْقَصِيدَةِ؟
options: الله هو خالق الطبيعة، وجمالها دليل على وجوده
العلماء غير ضروريين لأن الطبيعة تقدم كل الأدلة
الشك والإنكار خطايا يمكن محوها بالنظر إلى الطبيعة
qa.describe: The overall message is that the beauty of nature serves as clear evidence of God's existence and majesty.
